review_data.title: Misleading opening hours
review_data.content: Although their website says it’s open until 2 pm every day, when I went for lunch at 1 pm their kitchen was already closed. Besides the staff was very rude and unfriendly!

review_data.title: Entspanntes Kaffeehaus auf dem Areal Mühle Tiefenbrunnen
review_data.content: Auf dem historischen Industrieareal der Mühle Tiefenbrunnen gelegenes Cafe mit gutem Frühstück und entspannter Atmosphäre. Zuvorkommender und freundlicher Service.

review_data.title: Always nice
review_data.content: Love to go here for a cappuccino and a croissant. Nice places to sit, outside and inside, some good enhancements in staff and sufficient copies of NZZ. The food isn’t the best part here, but the sandwiches are good.

review_data.title: Finally, they changed the whole staff!
